sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_J301M ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HOME_SEIL_SUM , HOME_AMT_MN , HOME_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #homeSeilSum# , #homeAmtMn# , #homeMmAmt# , #fixCd# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnAddr# , #revnDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_J301M SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , HOME_SEIL_SUM=#homeSeilSum# , HOME_AMT_MN=#homeAmtMn# , HOME_MM_AMT=#homeMmAmt# , FIX_CD=#fixCd# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HOME_SEIL_SUM=#homeSeilSum# AND HOME_AMT_MN=#homeAmtMn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_J301M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HOME_SEIL_SUM=#homeSeilSum# AND HOME_AMT_MN=#homeAmtMn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HOME_SEIL_SUM , HOME_AMT_MN , HOME_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT FROM PDF_J301M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND HOME_SEIL_SUM=#homeSeilSum# AND HOME_AMT_MN=#homeAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , HOME_SEIL_SUM , HOME_AMT_MN , HOME_MM_AMT , FIX_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_ADDR , REVN_DT FROM PDF_J301M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , HOME_SEIL_SUM DESC , HOME_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_J301M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
